events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund for the item as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been classified under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to size issues.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket.

Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and I have not worn it outside at all.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days once we receive the jacket back. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions for the return.
Your refund case is now resolved. Please use the return label sent to your email to ship the jacket back to us.
Checking in to confirm you have been able to send back the jacket and to update you once your refund has been processed.
The refund has been successfully processed and credited to your original payment method. We are closing this case now. Thank you!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on how your refund request was handled.
